plot: Franky Bannon can't cope. In his fifties, recently widowed, he is suicidal. Until his bizarre imaginary childhood friends return to show him that the world is beautiful.
title: Jericho
plot_es: Franky Bannon can't cope. In his fifties, recently widowed, he is suicidal. Until his bizarre imaginary childhood friends return to show him that the world is beautiful.
plot_en: Franky Bannon can't cope. In his fifties, recently widowed, he is suicidal. Until his bizarre imaginary childhood friends return to show him that the world is beautiful.
